item.title: allostudio.fr, annuaire et portail des studios de musique en France
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Et c'est mon site ;) N'hésitez à y faire un tour et à me dire ce que vous en pensez !

item.title: Les Fondamentaux du Commerce !
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Conseils très instructifs sur ce blog que je vous recommande pour la qualité de ses articles.

item.title: How Should Companies Approach Twitter?
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Façon intéressante d'approcher la communication de son entreprise sur Twitter. Je pense que je vais adopter cette démarche.

item.title: Conduire une communauté
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Excellente traduction de l'article  de “Coaching a Community” par Laura Brunow Miner, publié sur A List Apart sur le site de Capitaine commerce. Une vraie mine d'informations.

item.title: 10 Lessons Learned in 22 Years of Bootstrapping
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded:
Retour d'expérience de Tim Berry où il expose ce qu'il appris en gérant une entreprise financée sur fonds propres. J'aime particulièrement le point n°1 "Nous avons fait beaucoup d'erreurs" et le point n°3 "Nous avons proposé un produit que les gens voulaient".
Via le twitter de GoodBarry

item.title: Les url personnalisées Facebook, c’est samedi
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Samedi matin, il va falloir se lever tôt pour avoir une belle url facebook personnalisée. A priori ce ne sera pas encore disponible pour les pages et les groupes en revanche.

item.title: Le blog du community management
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Je viens de découvrir ce blog dédié aux communautés sur Internet et à leur animation. Pleins d'articles intéressants, des interviews et des liens vers des ressources du même sujet. Je suis plongé dedans depuis deux jours...

item.title: Strangers at a cocktail party
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Un article de 37signals sur les dangers pour une entreprise de grossir trop vite et de se retrouver avec des collaborateurs qui ne se connaissent pas et qui, du coup, ne vont pas oser défendre suffisamment leur point de vue.

item.title: Plugin Wordpress pour gérer une newsletter – MeeNews
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Ce plugin a l'air vraiment puissant ! Si l'interface d'édition est à la hauteur, c'est vraiment une bonne alternative à des solutions payantes et souvent assez cher.

item.title: Why BLiNQ Acquired Ruby On Rails Talent To Support Facebook Campaigns
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Dave Williams, cofounder of search engine marketing agency 360i, and now founder and CEO of BLiNQ Media, recently acquired a two-man shop -- both experts in Ruby on Rails. Founded April 1, 2009, Calculated Combustion Founders Ryan Felton and Micah Wedemeyer join BLiNQ's seven others on the development team as senior software architects. "Many companies can't find the people experiences in the technology," he says. “Ruby on Rails enables our team to respond instantly to Facebook API changes that can delay other companies for up to three months,”

item.title: LivingSocial Gains Wealth Of Ruby on Rails Expertise With InfoEther Acquisition
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: In what appears to be mostly about the talent of its founding team, LivingSocial has moved toacquire Ruby on Rails consultancy outfit InfoEther.

item.title: Boston Companies Using Ruby on Rails
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Curious to learn why people were using it, I asked a handful of companies exactly that:  why are you using Ruby on Rails?  Below, you’ll find a list (by no means complete) of Boston organizations using RoR with some answers on why they are using it.

item.title: Why Making Web Apps with Rails Is Awesome
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: I’m fairly new to the Ruby on Rails web application framework. I just started learning it about eight months ago when I started developing my web app. I’ll share a story with you about my experience with Rails, and maybe you’ll be intrigued enough to try it out for yourself.

item.title: A new 37signals project: Pow
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Pow is a zero-config Rack server for Mac OS X. Have it serving your apps locally in under a minute.

item.title: The jQuery Divide
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: We need you to help us organize our jQuery-based application. It's a streaming pile of unmaintanable crap.

item.title: Here's Why Ruby On Rails Is Hot
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: I believe that Ruby on Rails is on fire because it is the most productive way to build web applications. This is a conclusion that I’ve drawn first hand by building Rails applications for customers for nearly five years.

item.title: Building a Killer Startup? Get Ruby on Rails
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: “Ruby on Rails is a framework,” said John. “It has all the key parts of an application already predefined. This means that a good programmer can look at existing code and understand how it works.”

item.title: Salesforce.com's Benioff talks growth
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: We bought a company called Heroku, which offers Ruby on Rails. Ruby on Rails is the fastest growing language on the Web today. from Salesforce.com CEO Marc Benioff

item.title: Groupon Buys Rails Software Development Startup Obtiva
item.dc:creator: Sylvain

item.title: CloudEdit: A Backbone.js Tutorial with Rails (Part 1)
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: In this tutorial, I'll go over the code for CloudEdit, an example Backbone.js app backed with Rails that outlines some basic patterns that I've used successfully in my Rails Backbone projects.

item.title: Life beyond HTTP 1.1: Google’s SPDY
item.dc:creator: Sylvain
item.content:encoded: Google's servers are also SPDY enabled. In other words, if you use Chrome, and you're using Google services, then many of those pages are not arriving to you over HTTP - you are actually running over SPDY!
